=Support the project=

[https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_xclick&business=aforge%2enet%40gmail%2ecom&item_name=IPLab%20application%20donation&no_shipping=0&no_note=1&tax=0&currency_code=USD&lc=GB&bn=PP%2dDonationsBF&charset=UTF%2d8 https://www.paypal.com/en_US/i/btn/x-click-but04.gif]

==Why do I need to donate?==

There are no obligations to do this, so you don't need to do it if you don't believe it is reasonable. It is only your personal choice to do this or not. Nobody insists or forces to do so.

==So what is it for?==

  * To show your appreciation to the work being done on the project and its support.
  * To show that you value the work, the time being spent on the project and its support, the time being spent to help you.
  * To support the project allowing it to grow and extend with new features, which will amaze you even more.
  * Just to say "Thank you".

People who work on this project are great enthusiasts, who provide a lot of effort and their own time to make the project exist and grow. If you like the project, appreciate our work and value our effort, you are more then welcome to support it as well.

Thank you.
